p: For 41 (out of 45, 91%) stockout events of AZT-3TC-NVP, TDF-3TC, CTX or HIV tests in health facilities, we could check the associated zonal warehouse. In 30 (73%) of these stockout events, a product was absent at the facility but present at the warehouse during the same period. The median time between facility and warehouse visits was 6 days (IQR: 5â€“20).
